price: Ntimukanegere ubusambanyi. Mu by’ukuri bwo ni icyaha gikomeye bukaba n’inzira mbi.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
